amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in the Congressional Record of July 9, 1997, to prohibit any funds appropriated in the bill from being used to support the U.S. Man and the Biosphere program or the World Heritage program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 203 (Roll no. 273).
